Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was postponed due to rain and will be played as a split doubleheader on Saturday, September 7, 2024. Luis Ortiz and Mitch Keller will pitch for the Pirates, while DJ Herz and Mitchell Parker will pitch for the Nationals in the first game. The second game will follow at 6:40 pm.
Others: The postponement was due to severe thunderstorms heading toward Pittsburgh, as indicated by radar.
